amendment.description: To appropriate funds to carry out programs relating to the innovation, process improvement, and marketing of dairy products.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3524, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 83 - 15. Record Vote Number: 178.

action.text: Amendment SA 3524 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Baldwin to Amendment SA 3399. (consideration: CR S5533, S5535-5536) To appropriate funds to carry out programs relating to the innovation, process improvement, and marketing of dairy products.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3524 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Baldwin to Amendment SA 3399.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3524, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 83 - 15. Record Vote Number: 178.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3524, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 83 - 15. Record Vote Number: 178.
